title: Pixel3a 3 months old screen went black receives calls/text no illumination rebooted issue persists
content: The screen began failing with a thumb print size black spot on the top left corner fading from blue to black and won't illuminate I've removed case,cleaned screen, rebooted device it receives calls and text but I can't read them or answer calls. Phone is still under factory warranty and hasn't been wet, dropped or damaged
